backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, push notifications, song requests, radio stream availability checks, and access control with role-based permissions (user/admin).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: updating the email address and website URL in the Settings/About screen.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including App.tsx with routing, hooks for queries/notifications/lifecycle management, components for UI elements, and service worker configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Documentation for version 99 rollback that reverted experimental features including background system, marquee animation, and service worker complexity.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest links, Apple mobile web app configuration, and Google Cast SDK integration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, display mode, and shortcuts for Mawalking Radio version 99.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker v3.1 implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, network-first for navigation, and push notification handling with click-to-focus behavior.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide for running the frontend verification script to detect build-breaking issues before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node.js verification script that checks TypeScript config, validates background asset paths in CSS and service worker, and confirms asset file existence.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing multi-view routing (home, now-playing, browse, venues, settings), audio playback state, user location, wake lock, and lifecycle recovery hooks.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: A Chromecast control button component that allows users to start/stop casting audio streams to Chromecast devices, with loading states and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: A PWA install prompt component that detects device/browser type (iOS Safari, Android Chrome, etc.) and shows platform-specific installation guides with dismissal tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar component with three tabs (Home, Shows, Settings) that displays icons and labels, handles tab switching, and includes safe area insets for mobile devices.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Compact player UI component that displays current track info with album art, marquee title, artist name, and play/pause button; clicking the container opens the full now-playing view.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Animated marquee component for scrolling long track titles with support for reduced motion preferences, keyboard navigation, and pause/resume on user interaction.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Volume control slider component that syncs with an HTML audio element reference and updates volume from 0-100.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: A settings panel for managing push notification subscriptions with diagnostics display, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: A dialog form component for submitting song requests or shout-outs to the DJ, with validation and success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: An alert banner that prompts users to refresh or reset the app when service worker updates are available or load errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: A share button component that uses the Web Share API when available, falling back to a modal with clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Card component displaying radio show information including image, title, description, genres, day, and time with hover effects and click handling.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Badge component displaying a pulsing "LIVE" indicator with radio icon for showing live broadcast status.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Simple pulsing dot indicator component to show on-air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: A toast-style notification component that displays now-playing track information with different visual styles for live shows, mixes, and regular tracks.
frontend/src/components/venues/VenueCard: Card component displaying venue details including name, address, distance, description, and action buttons for calling or viewing details.
frontend/src/components/venues/venueLink: Utility functions to build phone call links and Google Maps directions URLs from venue data, preferring coordinates over address strings.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Mock data defining Show interface and array of seven sample radio shows with Congolese music genres, schedules, and placeholder images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRole.ts: Hook that checks if the current user has admin role by calling the backend actor's isCallerAdmin method with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbumArtBackground: Hook file for album art background functionality (content truncated/empty in provided snippet).
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: React hook that monitors page visibility, focus, and bfcache events to automatically resume audio playback when the app returns to the foreground, respecting user intent and handling OS-level audio interruptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundImageDia: Diagnostic hook that checks if the body background image loaded correctly after mount and logs warnings with expected asset paths if the image is missing or failed to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: React hook that initializes and manages Chromecast functionality, providing methods to detect cast availability, connect to devices, and stream audio to Chromecast receivers using the Chrome Cast SDK.
frontend/src/hooks/useElementCallbackRef: Utility hook that combines a callback ref with state to provide both a stable ref setter and the current element instance, enabling effects to trigger when the DOM node changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Simple hook that manages a boolean favorite state persisted to localStorage, providing the current favorite status and a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing AuthClient initialization, login flow, identity persistence, and providing authentication state throughout the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardFocusInten: Hook that detects keyboard navigation intent by tracking Tab and arrow key presses, returning true during keyboard activity and false on pointer interactions to distinguish keyboard from programmatic focus.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Hook that measures container and text element dimensions to determine if marquee animation is needed, calculating CSS animation properties (duration, distance, gap) for seamless left-to-right scrolling based on overflow and configured speed.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages in-app and browser notifications for track changes, detecting show types (track/mix/live) and preventing duplicate notifications with debouncing. Requests notification permissions and displays notifications with artwork when tracks change.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles push notification subscription management using service workers and VAPID keys. Checks existing subscriptions, requests permissions, creates new subscriptions, and syncs them with the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching stream URLs (with HTTPS fallback), checking stream availability, fetching now-playing data from the radio API, and submitting song requests. Implements retry logic and error handling for all queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequestAdminRole.t: Provides a mutation hook to request admin role from the backend actor and invalidates the admin status query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, updates, and lifecycle including detecting update availability, applying updates, and resetting the service worker. Handles registration errors gracefully and provides diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a countdown sleep timer that automatically pauses audio playback when elapsed. Provides start and cancel functions with second-by-second countdown tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreamInterruption: Handles automatic recovery from stream interruptions using exponential backoff retry logic. Detects stream errors, stalls, and unexpected endings, attempting to reload and resume playback up to a maximum retry limit.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserLocation.ts: React hook that manages user location detection with GPS and IP-based fallback, including permission states, loading states, and retry functionality with configurable timeouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useVenueQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching nearby venues by location, fetching venue by ID, and submitting new venues with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: React hook that manages Screen Wake Lock API to prevent device screen from sleeping during active playback, with automatic re-acquisition on visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with dark theme variables, responsive background image system, marquee animation keyframes, safe area insets for mobile devices, and fixed bottom UI clearance utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/screens/AdminVenuesScreen.t: Admin interface for managing venue submissions with tabs for pending and approved venues, supporting approve, reject, and remove actions with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Screen component for browsing radio shows with genre and day filters, displaying filtered results in a card list layout.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Main home screen displaying live radio player controls, favorite/share buttons, notification permission prompts, and a list of nearby venues using geolocation. Includes play/pause, error handling, and distance calculation utilities.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Full-screen now playing view with album art, track info marquee, volume controls, and sleep timer functionality. Displays current song metadata and provides playback controls with background blur effects.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings and about page with push notification configuration, admin role management, background cache refresh functionality, and navigation to venue submission and admin panels.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Detail view for radio shows displaying schedule, genres, description, and actions to add to calendar or set reminders. Uses mock show data and generates ICS calendar files.
frontend/src/screens/VenueDetailScreen.t: Venue detail screen showing full information including address, contact details, hours, amenities, and action buttons for calling, getting directions, and visiting website. Fetches venue data by ID.
frontend/src/screens/VenuesListScreen.ts: React component that displays a list of nearby rhumba venues based on user location, calculates distances using the Haversine formula, and handles loading/error states with venue selection callbacks.
frontend/src/screens/VenueSubmitScreen.t: Form screen for submitting new venue information including business details, location coordinates, contact info, venue type, amenities, and photo URLs. Includes validation and submission handling.
Collects and displays startup errors (resource, script, rejection, service worker) before React mounts, showing a recovery overlay only when critical errors exceed a threshold.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Google Analytics utility providing safe event tracking functions for audio playback (play/pause) and Chromecast events with typed parameters and silent failure handling.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates and downloads ICS calendar files for radio show schedules, calculating next show dates based on day/time and formatting events in iCalendar format.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Validates and normalizes artwork URLs from now-playing metadata, handling relative paths, protocol-relative URLs, and enforcing HTTPS-only absolute URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities for sensitive parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended screens, animations, and theme tokens for a radio app UI with sidebar and chart components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking two completed features for updating email and website URL in the Settings/About screen for Mawalking Radio application.
